Name: ghost
Description: Hide another crate.

Name: nightly
Description: Hide all other crates.
Flavor: "The night is dark and full of terrors"

Name: gotham
Description: Get +1 point per hidden crates.

Name: hound
Description: Add 1pt to crates and techniques.

Name: bat
Description: Before each of your turns: Activate a card
Flavor: na na na na na na na na na na na na...

Name: charming
Description: Draw a card, show it to other players.

Name: hex
Description: Hide 3 cards, play 2 cards, draw 1 card.

Name: spectre
Description: Choose 2 players, and assign them a category, they give their corresponding card to the other player.

Name: noir
Description: When next player draws a card, if you guess correctly its category, you steal the card.

Name: warp
Description: Passive: You only have 10 seconds to play your first card. Other players are counting!

Name: goblin
Description: Show all your techniques in hand to other players.

Name: rune
Description: Passive: keywords "hide" and "activate" swap their meaning while this is visible.

Name: crevice
Description: All players can't draw until the end of your next turn.

Name: serpent
Description: Next player take a card from your hand.

Name: random_name_generator
Description: You choose a new name, if someone refer to you without using that name, they must hide a card.

Name: sugars
Description: Discard all your other crates and gain their points. Draw a card.

Name: spider
Description: Passive: Whenever you draw a card, you must say its category to other players.
Flavor: Crawling through a web of information

Name: digest
Description: Hide another crate, then activate yet another one.

Name: crypto-common
Description: Hide a technique.

Name: web-time
Description: Next turn, activate a card.
Flavor: I've seen so many doctors I lost count.

Name: web-sys
Description: Get +1pt for each different preferred browser used by players.

Name: bcrypt
Description: Hide a member.

Name: goose
Description: Take 2 cards from your discard pile, play them hidden.
Flavor: At least this game has a title.

Name: sauron
Description: You and next player activate a card.

Name: sledgehammer
Description: Reduce the number of rounds before the game ends by 1.

Name: HECK
Description: Play an additional card, hidden.

Name: http-body
Description: Previous player plays a card, hidden.

Name: pest
Description: Swap any 2 hidden cards.

Name: bytemuck
Description:
Hide a member.
Next turn: activate a crate.

Name: radium
Description: While visible: on your turn, you can draw at most 1 card and play at most 1 card. Ignore any contradictory instructions.

Name: void
Description:
Play hidden. 

This counts as 2 points in technique if hidden when counting final points.

Name: mockall
Description: Play hidden in technique, if activated, this must go in crates.
Flavor: Fake it till you make it

Name: value-bag
Description: While visible: don't draw a card when your turn begins ; draw from next player's draw pile at the end of your turn.

Name: whoami
Description: Show your hand to next player.

Name: lurk-cli
Description: Play hidden. when activated, get +1pt
